item.title: Tom Brady's Message to Lamar Jackson, J.J. McCarthy as They Return From Injury
item.description: Tom Brady related his injury experience to what Lamar Jackson and J.J. McCarthy might feel this week.

item.title: 2025 NFL AFC, NFC Title Odds: Chiefs, Lions Favored Heading Into Week 9

item.title: NFL Trade Deadline Buzz: Latest Intel on Selling Teams, Players to Watch
item.description: FOX Sports' Ralph Vacchiano and Eric D. Williams break down what they're hearing ahead of the NFL trade deadline on Nov. 4.

item.title: Blue Jays Game 5 Star Trey Yesavage Achieved Incredibly Rare World Series Feat
item.description: Trey Yesavage pulled off a feat that just three other pitchers in the history of the World Series have managed before, two of them Hall of Famers.
